title: Around The World in First Class The Dubai Experience (Plus Bonus Footage of Swanky Emirates’ Shower!) Frugal Travel Guy

type_specific.selection: This is the second in a six-part series about a trip my wife Sara and I recently took around the world in first class. On our way to Thailand, we stopped in Dubai for a brief stopover/stay. Check out the photo gallery at the bottom of the post! The easiest way to fly first-class on Emirates is […]
